com.nobigsoftware.dfalex

Class StringReplacements

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nobigsoftware.dfalex.StringReplacements

  • public class StringReplacements
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class containing common StringReplacements that can be used with SearchAndReplaceBuilder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static StringReplacement DELETE
      Replacement that deletes the matching substring
      static StringReplacement IGNORE
      Replacement that leaves the matching substring unmodified
      static StringReplacement SPACE_OR_NEWLINE
      Replacement that converts the matching substring to a single space (if it does not contain any newlines) or a newline (if it does contain a newline)
      static StringReplacement TOLOWER
      Replacement that converts the matching substring to lower case
      static StringReplacement TOUPPER
      Replacement that converts the matching substring to upper case

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringReplacements() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StringReplacement string(java.lang.CharSequence str)
      Make a replacement that replaces matching substrings with a given string
      static StringReplacement surround(java.lang.CharSequence prefix, StringReplacement replacement, java.lang.CharSequence suffix)
      Make a replacement that surrounds matches with a given prefix and suffix, and applies the given replacer to the match itself

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • surround

        public static final StringReplacement surround(java.lang.CharSequence prefix,
                                               StringReplacement replacement,
                                               java.lang.CharSequence suffix)
        Make a replacement that surrounds matches with a given prefix and suffix, and applies the given replacer to the match itself
        Parameters:
        prefix - to put before matches
        replacement - for the match itself
        Returns:
        suffix to put after matches
